SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POINT WHERE TYPE = '2' AND STATE = '1') AS completeCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POINT WHERE TYPE = '2' AND STATE = '2') AS requestCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POINT WHERE TYPE = '2' AND STATE = '3') AS rejectCnt FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POINT (MEMBER, TYPE, VALUE, ACCUMULATE, CONTENT, STATE) VALUES (#{member},#{type},#{value},#{accumulate},#{content},#{state});
mapper.select: SELECT VALUE FROM ADMIN WHERE TYPE = #{type}
mapper.update: UPDATE ADMIN SET VALUE = #{value} WHERE TYPE = #{type}
